rooms.description: Serving as the entry point and reception area with an open layout, incorporating natural light via floor-to-ceiling windows.
Spacious living area with floor-to-ceiling windows for panoramic views and ample sunlight. Adjacent to the dining area.
Serves as a dining space with direct access from the living room, incorporating ambient lighting.
Multi-functional space for family gatherings and leisure activities, featuring floor-to-ceiling windows.
A private bedroom for guests with natural lighting and minimalistic design.

openings.location: Multiple openings on living room, family room, and entrance hall walls
openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling windows to maximize natural light.
Main entry door leading into the open-plan living area.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with an adjoining ensuite bathroom and floor-to-ceiling windows offering privacy while capturing natural light.
Comfortable bedroom with adequate storage space and natural lighting.
Additional bedroom designed for comfort and convenience with floor-to-ceiling windows.
Multi-functional study or home office space with adequate lighting and privacy.

openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling windows for optimal daylight penetration.

openings.location: Between master bedroom and ensuite bathroom
openings.description: Private access door to the ensuite bathroom.
